LanguageData.VCE_AquaticGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow aquatic plants. Aquatic plants ignore terrain fertility but take a very long time to sow and harvest.\n\nThese zones can't be placed on oceanic (salty) water.
LanguageData.VCE_SandyGrowingZoneDesc: Create a zone where your colonists will try to grow sandy terrain plants. Sand plants ignore terrain fertility but take a very long time to sow and harvest.
LanguageData.VCE_NotInEquator: Not in equatorial region (in this planet, below {0} latitude). Growing normally.
LanguageData.VCE_NeedsShade: This plant needs to grow in shade: outside, but under a roof.
LanguageData.VCE_NotPollinated: No apiary found in a 6 tiles radius (calculated on sowing)
LanguageData.VCE_StuntedGrowthFertility: Growth reduced due to non-rocky terrain
LanguageData.VCE_StoppedGrowthFertility: Growth impossible due to too fertile terrain
LanguageData.VCE_WaterNearby: A body of water nearby is impeding this plant's growth
LanguageData.VCE_NoWaterNearby: Lack of a body of water nearby is impeding this plant's growth
LanguageData.VCE_NoSeaTilesNearby: Too far away from the sea, no extra growth bonus
LanguageData.VCE_SeaTilesNearby: {0} sea tiles nearby, providing {0}% growth bonus
